<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Recommendations[DEPRECATED]"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/recommendations"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Recommendations are generated based on the available information for a given seed entity and matched against similar artists and tracks. If there is sufficient information about the provided seeds, a list of tracks will be returned together with pool size details.

For artists and tracks that are very new or obscure there might not be enough data to generate a list of tracks.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"seed_artists","description":"A comma separated list of Spotify IDs for seed artists. Up to 5 seed values may be provided in any combination of seed_artists, seed_tracks and seed_genres.\n\n**Note:** *only required if seed_genres and seed_tracks are not set.*","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"0Y3agQaa6g2r0YmHPOO9rh"}},{"name":"seed_genres","description":"A comma separated list of any genres in the set of available genre seeds. Up to 5 seed values may be provided in any combination of seed_artists, seed_tracks and seed_genres.\n\n**Note:** *only required if seed_artists and seed_tracks are not set.*","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"pop%2Chippop"}},{"name":"seed_tracks","description":"A comma separated list of Spotify IDs for a seed track. Up to 5 seed values may be provided in any combination of seed_artists, seed_tracks and seed_genres.\n\n**Note:** *only required if seed_artists and seed_genres are not set.*","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"4jzhMxpTkAm2pxUuamulT8"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
